ingredients.ingredient: 18 (6 inch) corn tortillas, torn in half
1 (28 ounce) can green chile enchilada sauce
1 (16 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 (8 ounce) container reduced fat sour cream

cookingTips: Shred the cooked chicken for easier mixing with the sauce
Reserve some cheese to sprinkle on top before baking for a golden finish
Let the casserole rest 5 minutes after baking for cleaner servings
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through layering tortillas and sauce evenly to ensure consistent flavor throughout the casserole.
